description.short: Engineered a full-stack, real-time multiplayer application with a server-authoritative Node.js backend that manages all game logic.
long: Engineered a full-stack, real-time multiplayer application with a server-authoritative Node.js backend that manages all game logic.
Utilized Socket.IO to push instantaneous state updates to a reactive Vue.js frontend, and implemented persistent user sessions with JWTs for graceful reconnections.
Integrated a PostgreSQL database using Prisma ORM to store user accounts and game history.
